From what we’ve researched, it operates between 3.3 to 5 volts, but the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePWM\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Pulse Width Modulation\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e input works at 6 volts.
